name: Winter Cup

ingredients.item: Montecristo Spiced Blend Rum (or other spiced rum)

preparation:
In a shaker, gently muddle the strawberry, lime, lemon, orange and mint (do not break up the mint).
Add the spiced rum and St-Germain, and fill with ice.
Shake lightly and pour (unstrained) into an Old Fashioned glass.
Garnish with a mint sprig.
